Definition: Given a story of four sentences, you will have to choose one of the two options to make the story sound.

Positive Examples.input:
Statement: A landscape is a painting or a photograph which focuses on the face of a person
Reasons: (A) Any landscape can be captured in a painting or a photograph (B) landscapes portray land rather than individual people (C) painting the face of a person requires some skill
Positive Examples.explanation: Landscape is a painting which focuses on land. Thus Reason B is correct.

Positive Examples.input:
Statement: He went to the police station to withdraw cash.
Reasons: (A) Police station is a place to file criminal complaints. (B) Police catches thieves while money can buy you things. (C) Police station has jails but no money to give.
Positive Examples.explanation: You don't go to the police station to withdraw cash. As, Police station is a place to file criminal complaints. Thus, Reason A is correct.

Negative Examples.input:
Statement: Whales rain from the sky.
Reasons: (A) Whales have Killer Whales as predators. (B) Whales are to heavy to be apart of the water cycle. (C) Whales can communicate underwater.
Negative Examples.explanation: Whales are heavy so they cannot rain from the sky and thus Reason B is correct and the given ouput is incorrect..

Negative Examples.input:
Statement: A boy turns off the door
Reasons: (A) A door can be closed but a door cannot be turned off (B) A door cannot turn off a light (C) A light cannot close the door
Negative Examples.explanation: Reason C is an incorrect explanation as to why the statement is incorrect. The statement is incorrect because one cannot turn off a door. Hence, Reason A is correct.
